sentences.sContent: Then Tiny wept, and said she would not marry the disaGREeable mole.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then Tiny wept, and said she would not marry the disaGREeable mole.
sentences.sCn: 但是拇指姑娘哭了起来，说她不愿意和这讨厌的鼹鼠结婚。

synos.tran: 鼹鼠；痣；[水运]防波堤；胎块

trans.tranOther: a small dark furry animal which is almost blind. Moles usually live under the ground.
